data.message: You’re a great public figure and have millions of followers (Many Kids) supposed to be a good example... You fucked up talking shit about the president. I used to be a fan!

replies.message: Oh man :( looks like you're standing on the other side of that line he drew

❄️️🚨

You've never listened to Eminem before have you?
You use to be a fan? He says plenty of times in his songs that he isn't a role model lol
He "i used to be a fan" may i ask😐 who cares 🤔🤔 Em sure doesn't
He drew a line in the sand.....why are you still here?...thought it was pretty cut and dry.
I’m a fan of his music not his political views. Honestly I’m tired of his whining and bitching lolll 😂
Our president is supposed to be a role model to kids. Instead, hes a pussy grabbing, tiny hands having, inarticulate cheeto. Pot, meet kettle.
Fuck trump
Don't be a Stan.
Cry more, Don.
If you're a fan of his but don't agree with him then why are you a fan he's dissed every president 😂
But people can’t disagree with trump and still be American. Or go without being called names for disagreeing.

Apparently you forgot about the song Mosh. Where it was nothing but politics telling people to go vote and use their voice to get Bush out of the oval office. Where he also said fuck you to the president.

...but now he's not a role model and now you're not a fan?

Sounds like to me that you were never really a fan and just want to be hip ro the times and bitch about something to have people respond to you so that you feel important.
So you missed when em literally said fuck bush lol. You aint a fan.  Em been coming at presidents since he blew up.

His political views are all over his music
You ain't foolin' anyone you're just startin' to loose it
Lol he talked shit about George Bush. Bill Clinton. Dick Cheney. Lmao nothing new. You just look like a poorly educated snowflake
In the words of Eminem, FUCK YOU 🖕
Tony Alvizo opposite of you ignorant freeloaders!
Fuck Trump
He doesn't care about you, Don. Move on bro.
Cry me a river~
Robert Opeka what man isn't???  And I should know, I'm a woman, so shut up and let the women proclaim who is a dickface and who isnt!

I too stand strong with my Reality TV star President who calls people ”Liddle“ and would like to bang his own daughter. I especially love how he has accomplished nothing because he really is not Mr Art of the Deal.
GRIGORIAN ------- You ignore all the shit Trump said? FUCK YOU, dude!

Sorry aber euer president ist nicht ganz fit im Kopf und Eminem ein geiler Typ der seine Meinung sagt und wenn du nur aus dem Grund nicht mehr sein Fan bist dann hast du seine Musik nie geliebt und verstanden.
